name: Magic Guide

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 15%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 18%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 21%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.

description: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.
